model.board
Class DetailedMove

java.lang.Object
  model.board.Move
      model.board.DetailedMove

public class DetailedMove
extends Move

A more detailed Move.

Author:
Sebastian Paaske Tørholm

Constructor Detail

DetailedMove

public DetailedMove(Square from,
                    Square to,
                    Piece mover,
                    Piece target,
                    Position startingBoard,
                    int flags)
Creates a DetailedMove.

Parameters:
from - source square of move
to - target square of move
mover - piece that performs the move
target - piece that is targetted by the move (can be null if no capture takes place)
startingBoard - state of the board prior to the move
flags - bitfield of flags for the move
Requires:
from != null && to != null && mover != null, !from.equals(to)
Method Detail

addFlags

public void addFlags(int flags)
Adds flags to this move.

Parameters:
flags - bitfield of flags

setPromotion

public void setPromotion(PieceType promoteTo)
Sets that this move promotes a piece.

Parameters:
promoteTo - the type it promotes to - null to unset it

capture

public boolean capture()
Returns:
true iff the move makes a capture

check

public boolean check()
Returns:
true iff the move brings the opponent into check

checkmate

public boolean checkmate()
Returns:
true iff the move brings the opponent into checkmate

inACN

public java.lang.String inACN()
Returns:
the move in Algebraic Chess Notation

capturedPiece

public Piece capturedPiece()
Returns:
the piece captured by this move
Requires:
this.capture()
